description.value:
Major Curse: Asmodeus has taken note of the chaos you have wrought. You receive an ancient wound that feels older than time itself. You become permanently @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Drained]{Drained} 4, and nothing short of another intercession can remove the condition.

Your wound aches fiercely whenever you perform a particularly chaotic act, causing you to become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened} 1.
